head.title: Split {{FileFormatUp}} documents in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to split {{FileFormatUp}} files into separate documents. Easily manage PDFs, Word files, Excel sheets, PowerPoint slides, Visio files, images, archives, and more.

header.title: Split {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{EnvNameShort}} applications with advanced document processing features. Easily split {{FileFormatUp}} files and work with various popular business formats.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document processing library that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It enables merging, splitting, extracting, moving, swapping, and deleting pages to simplify document management.

more_features.title: Advanced document management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a complete set of tools for efficiently processing over 50 commonly used business file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge multiple file formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, Visio diagrams, images, and archives. Customize the merging process for precise results.

feature_2.title: Organize document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange pages by moving, swapping, or deleting them to improve document structure.

feature_3.title: Adjust page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape orientations.

feature_4.title: Extract pages as separate files
feature_4.content: Select specific pages or a page range and save them as a new file in a chosen location.

formats.title: Split multiple file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file types, making document modification quick and efficient.
